title: HoP 346 - Cecilia Muratori on Animals in the Renaissance
itunes:title: HoP 346 - Cecilia Muratori on Animals in the Renaissance
description: An interview with Cecilia Muratori, an expert on the surprisingly modern ideas about non-human animals that emerged in the Renaissance.
